name: TradersHighway
tag_list: trading, traders, trading-education, day-traders, trading-educators, trading-strategies
overview: TradersHighway mission is simple: connect the world’s traders and educators to make them more productive and successful. TradersHighway allows traders to find the experts they admire and educators to reach new followers who value their ideas and strategies everyday. When traders join TradersHighway, traders get access to traders like them, educators they respect, market information and insights that help them be great at what they do. TradersHighway is the best place for traders to exchange ideas everyday
